products.title: Splash Beige Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Beige Electric Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary.  This elegant cream coloured elecrtric roller blind will make a wonderful additon to any room and will compliment wooden tones throughtout the home.  Electric roller blinds work perfectly for more difficult to reach windows & can provide the perfect finishing touch when dressing a window.  With a 5 year guarantee on all our products, you can rest assured that you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1894 Fabric Colour: Beige Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes
